snippet: Prime Minister David Cameron’s Conservatives took a beating Friday with a by-election result that showed surging support for the United Kingdom Independence Party, a right-wing group.
abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron's Conservatives take harsh pummeling day after results of by-election show surging support for right-wing United Kingdom Independence Party.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister David Cameron’s Conservatives took a beating Friday with a by-election result that showed surging support for the United Kingdom Independence Party, a right-wing group.

headline.seo: British Vote Shows New Support for Right-Wing Party
headline.main: Stinging Electoral Defeat for British Conservatives as Right-Wing Party Makes Gains
headline.print_headline: Stinging Electoral Defeat for British Conservatives as Right-Wing Party Makes Gains
